page.title: 02ROYSTON MUSEUM
page.content: {Royston Museum}is on the eastern side of Royston in Kneesworth Street.The museum used to be a school,it was changed into a museum about two years ago.Inside the museum there are things like old bottles,paintings and old shop posters. The {curator}is named Mr Roles and he is the person who talks to you about the museum.He also organises things for you if you want to put things into the museum.It was built in the nineteenth century. There is a{Town Crier's bell}in the museum and old{gas lamps}and{pictures} of old postwomen and men,{rattles}and other{field cutting tools.}The old tools were used up to about 50 years ago so they are quite common.They also have old Crows{(Royston's local {newspaper)}which are tiny against ours and hold up to twice as much news and
